thyroid_nodule.characteristics: heterogeneous, hypoechoic with lobulated margins and scattered central calcification

relevant_findings.lymph_nodes: No palpable lymphadenopathy initially, single palpable lymph node noted later

changes_over_time.lymphadenopathy: Cervical lymphadenopathy noted later with abnormal architecture and microcalcifications
changes_over_time.thyroid_nodules: Ultrasonography revealed two thyroid nodules with calcifications
